title: Edge Node Resource Management
summary: Introduces edge node capabilities to manage resources and workloads closer to the data source, enhancing response times and reducing central server load.

title: Edge Node Event Processing
summary: Implements real-time event processing on edge nodes to improve system responsiveness and reduce latency.

title: Efficient Pod-to-Pod Communication Optimization
summary: Implements advanced networking strategies to enhance data transfer efficiency between pods in a Kubernetes cluster.

title: Implement Parallel API Server for High Availability
summary: Introduces a parallel API server setup to ensure high availability and seamless failover during API upgrades.
